name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Experienced Software Engineer with a strong proficiency in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and modern development methodologies, including **TDD** and **Agile** practices. Possesses over 10 years of delivering innovative software solutions, particularly within the healthcare and finance sectors. Adept in **Golang**, **C#**, and **Java**, and demonstrates expertise in building scalable applications and microservices using advanced architectures like **DDD** and **Clean Architecture**. Proficient in cloud technologies, including **Kubernetes** and **GitLab CI**, for efficient deployment and orchestration of applications.

Brings hands-on experience in AI and ML solutions, utilizing tools to implement intelligent systems that facilitate automation and enhance decision-making. Strong analytical skills and a commitment to building secure, maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards. A proven track record in leading teams to deliver high-performance applications that have measurable impacts.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and maintained robust applications using **Python** (including frameworks like **FastAPI**), ensuring best practices in **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and **Agile** methodologies for enhanced product delivery and team collaboration.
•	Engineered backend microservices using **Golang** and **C#**, leveraging **Kubernetes** and **GitLab CI** for continuous integration and deployment of code, achieving a **30% reduction** in deployment time and increased scalability.
•	Designed and optimized data storage solutions with **PostgreSQL**, enabling efficient data retrieval and manipulation, which led to a **25% improvement** in application performance when handling large datasets.
•	Implemented large-scale machine learning models and algorithms to enhance features and user experiences, utilizing **AI** and **ML** techniques that resulted in accurate predictions and insights for both healthcare and finance sectors.
•	Utilized **Kafka** for reliable messaging and event streaming across services, improving data flow efficiency and system responsiveness, supporting **real-time data processing** for enhanced decision-making capabilities.
•	Led architecture design decisions using **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** and **Clean Architecture** principles, establishing maintainable and adaptable codebases for future expansion and new feature integration.
•	Collaborated on cross-functional teams to strengthen software quality through rigorous testing strategies, employing tools such as Jest and Postman to ensure and uphold testing standards for **unit, integration, and E2E tests**.
•	Managed scalable cloud solutions with container orchestration tools like **Helm** and **Kubernetes**, enabling high availability of services with a **99.9% uptime** rate across multiple production environments.
•	Integrated advanced search capabilities using **ElasticSearch**, providing efficient solutions for handling vast amounts of structured and unstructured data, benefiting end-users with **rapid search functionalities**.
•	Conducted code reviews and mentorship sessions to foster skill development regarding **Agile practices**, ensuring adherence to coding standards and team efficiency.

Utilized **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Kafka** to architect and implement scalable, maintainable financial platforms, successfully enhancing throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
Leveraged **GitLab CI** to automate continuous integration and delivery processes, ensuring efficient and error-free deployments across software projects.
Adopted **Agile** methodologies to streamline project management and improve team collaboration, resulting in a **30%** increase in development speed and delivery timelines.
Designed and developed ETL pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating efficient batch and real-time data ingestion from internal and third-party sources, processing up to **1 million** transactions daily.
Implemented robust security measures using **AI** and **ML** techniques to improve fraud detection systems, achieving a **95%** accuracy rate in transaction anomaly detection.
Created scalable microservices using **Golang** and **Kubernetes**, leading to improved application performance and reliability, with a reduction in downtime by **40%**.
Conducted thorough unit testing and TDD practices to enhance code quality and maintainability, significantly reducing bugs and increasing overall software reliability.

Utilized **Python** along with frameworks like **FastAPI** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring maximum scalability and low latency, which improved checkout performance by **30%**.
Engineered real-time features using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to create an event-driven architecture, enhancing order update responsiveness and reducing customer support response times by **25%**.
Developed robust applications with **React (18)** and **Vue 3**, applying **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** to deliver superior user experiences on both web and mobile platforms, achieving a **40%** increase in user engagement.
Leveraged databases such as **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB** for efficient data storage solutions, effectively maintaining data access speeds for high-traffic workflows and ensuring **99.9%** uptime.
Integrated AI and ML algorithms, utilizing tools like **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, to drive personalized user experiences, resulting in a **15%** boost in conversion rates through optimized product recommendations.
Implemented **Redis** cache solutions for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, drastically improving application response time by **50%**, while reducing database load.
Defined deployment strategies using **Kubernetes** and **GitLab CI**, implementing feature flags and blue-green deployment methodologies to facilitate smooth rollouts and A/B testing, enhancing feature delivery speed by **20%**.
Developed mobile-first, SEO-friendly interfaces using **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1) and achieving top SERP rankings for key search terms.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions to maintain PCI compliance and safeguard sensitive user data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring GDPR compliance while protecting user data across the platform.
